title: OPL Round 3 Tipping results!
body:
Our main man Riot Benji only managed to get 6 out of 8 match ups correctly last round! Legacy vs Dire Wolves and Sudden Fear vs Rich Gang tripped him up.

No one managed to pick all 8 matches correctly.....but this time you only had to beat Benji. So how many summoners managed to beat Riot Benji?
**32** summoners managed to pick 7 games correctly this round!

Chief Sigils
Fruitsalad
Elfishguy11
iNjEktiOn92

TheFalconpunchh
TouchPad
wasq16
Chief ScREAM

Congratulations! (you will be receiving your prize around 12pm AEDT Thursday)

replies.body:
Wow didn't expect to actually win >.>

Cool that RIOT is doing stuff like this with the community.
